name: scth
description:
Ever heard of Dark Souls? Well, this is the bootleg version.

Cobbled together from a myriad of assets that don't necessarily work together, this short adventure follows Lanky Larry on his quest to defeat the Swolem Golem and become thick and tight. Along the way, you will encounter 2.5 types of enemies, none of which are particularly dangerous.

Wield a scythe that doesn't quite stay in your hands at all times! Fight a boss who was actually intended to be a miniboss! Experience poorly retarged animations that were originally created for millions of dollars and now are the lone remnants of a now defunct MOBA!

Controls

D-pad Left / 1 key: Throwing Knife

D-pad Up / 2 key: Warp To Last Checkpoint

D-pad Right / 3 key: Stamina Regen Buff

D-pad Down / 4 key: Damage Buff

Square / 5 key: Healing Potion

Cross / E: Interact

Circle / Left Ctrl: Dash

Right Bumper / Left Mouse Button: Attack

Click Left Stick / Q: Toggle Lock On
